title: Seduced by His Lies
overview: Returning from an extended work trip overseas, Terri arrives home to find a mysterious yet captivating stranger Marcus, living in her recently purchased town home. Both believing theyâ€™ve fallen victim to a real estate scam, the duo team up to expose the criminals. Their passionate pursuit for justice sparks a scorching attraction, blurring the lines between desire and danger. As they plunge deeper into the treacherous underworld of the scam, their shared mission evolves into a seductive dance, where the boundaries between vengeance and passion become dangerously entangled.
